instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00165 left usb not working
threads.message: Please I need help here guys.. 820-00165 left USB not working , there?s power but no data. I have replaced the I/O BOARD AND CABLE , the right USB works fine?I also replaced D9510, D9511, D9520, and D9521 but still no changes , Any ideas please

threads.title: 820-00165 left usb not working
threads.message:
Inspect LIO connector on MLB.
Check diode mode readings on its USB data lines, including XDP_USB_EXTB_OC_L.
Check R1580-83 resistors.
Also post voltage for XDP_USB_EXTB_OC_L, with and w/o any USB device connected.

threads.title: 820-00165 left usb not working
threads.message: The Usb is sorted ... XDP_USB_EXTB_OC_L was missing

threads.title: 820-00165 left usb not working
threads.message:
"XDP_USB_EXTB_OC_L was missing"
Bad R5181, or what?
Is the overcurrent signal from USB power port to PCH.
If goes low, PCH disables that port.

threads.title: 820-00165 left usb not working
threads.message: Bad R1581 , so replaced it , sorry I replied late
